Title: Relates to the registered weight of tow trucks
Summary: Increases, from 8,600 pounds to 10,000 pounds, the gross vehicle weight rating of vehicles engaged in commercial towing that must be registered as tow trucks.
LawCode: Amd ยง401-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the registered weight of tow trucks
